QuestData.Title: Wakening Sickness
QuestData.Description: You will forgive my current state. I have slept for many years.$B$BA Klaxxi'va should have been here to attend my Wakening with kypari sap... but you will have to do.$B$BI sense the buzzing of sapflies to the south. They gorge on the nourishing sap I need. Bring them to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 100 Sapfly Bits to Kil'ruk the Wind-Reaver in the Terrace of Gurthan.
QuestData.CompletionText: Without nourishment, I will die where I stand.
